QuestData.Title: Empty Nests
QuestData.Description: When the attacks began, the young hatchlings scattered in terror.$B$BThey are roaming around the island, lost and scared.$B$BIf you want to help, take this rope and leash the lost little ones. Take them back to their nests. Return them home.
QuestData.LogDescription: Leash and return 6 Windward Hatchlings to their nests.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you return the hatchlings to their nests?
QuestData.RewardText: Don't worry. The hatchlings will be safe inside their nests.$B$BI can't thank you enough for arriving when you did.

Objectives.Objective: Windward Hatchlings returned to their nests
